creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text:
To support other filetypes the webdav module now uses getSourceExtension() to
add the file extension.  XML content files now appear as .xml files which do not
open correctly in Dreamweaver.

Created attachment 17914
patches for propfind.jx and filePropfind.jx

These patches test for the source extension, and if it is .xml it uses .html
for the extension but otherwise uses the source extension.

Also replaced contentlength property with getcontentlength to match xslt
changes from bug #39017.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
